Redfang Prophecy.name: Redfang Prophecy
Redfang Prophecy.flavor: You cause your enemy to feel teeth crunching through bone. Your summoned creature then heightens that enemy’s pain.
Redfang Prophecy.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage. Until the end of your next turn, your summoned creatures deal extra damage against the target equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Summon Primal Slayer.name: Summon Primal Slayer
Summon Primal Slayer.flavor: Fast, lethal, and capable of changing its shape, the primal slayer s an extension of your deadly will.
Summon Primal Slayer.effect: You summon a Large primal slayer in an unoccupied space within range. The primal slayer has speed 8. You can give the primal slayer the following special commands. On the turn you summon the primal slayer, you give either command as part of using this power.
Summon Primal Slayer.standardAction: The primal slayer changes size to Medium if it was Large and gains a fly speed of 8 and can hover, and it then shifts 2 squares and attacks: melee 1; targets one creature; Wisdom vs. Reflex; 3d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.
Summon Primal Slayer.instinctiveEffect: If you haven’t given the primal slayer any commands by the end of your turn, it attacks a bloodied enemy if it can. Otherwise, it attacks an adjacent enemy. It makes the first attack if it is Medium and the second if it is Large.

Tightened Control.name: Tightened Control
Tightened Control.flavor: The bond between you and your summoned beasts grows stronger, strengthening them.
Tightened Control.effect: Until the stance ends, your summoned creatures gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls, except when such rolls are part of an instinctive effect.
